remarks: An inverse in the category of sets is the converse operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
setcmon.c $e |- C = ( SetCat ` U ) $.
setcmon.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
setcmon.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. U ) $.
setcmon.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. U ) $.
setcinv.n $e |- N = ( Inv ` C ) $.
setcinv $p |- ( ph -> ( F ( X N Y ) G <-> ( F : X -1-1-onto-> Y /\ G = `' F ) ) ) $.
